The summary file is written to standard output.

example.description: Generates a summary from the fit file "19971020.gbr.fit" to produce a file called "19971020.gbr.smr". Ranges with lag-zero power less than 5dB are ignored. Beams 5 and 10 are recorded. Status is logged on standard error.
